post:
Hello all,

Firstly, I want to thank you LET community for supporting us and ordering servers to us, to reward your support, we're giving **10% lifetime discount** in our VPS plans and Dedicated Server (Xeon E5-2430L).

Please use coupon code: **LETMAY** - **LIFETIME DEAL** (valid until 21 May), to get 10% discount on VPS Plans & Dedicated Server (Xeon E5-2430L).

Company:
We are a vps, dedicated servers, shared hosting and colocation provider, our servers are located in our own data center in Prishtina and are fully owned by us, we also provide VPS in Germany and United Kingdom (we use OVH datacenters to provide DE & UK services).

Features:
-Developers API (Shared Hosting, VPS, Domains).
-Payment methods: Bitcoin, PayPal, Credit Card.
-Our Datacenter Location: Prishtina, Kosovo.
-VPS Locations: Kosovo, Germany, United Kingdom.
-ASN: AS207817 - ILLYSOFT, AL
-Speedtest Server: https://speedtest.illyhosting.com/
-Looking Glass: https://lg.illyhosting.com/
-Test ip: 194.5.235.3
-Test file: https://speedtest.illyhosting.com/1GB.bin
-Setup time: Instant.
-VPS Control Panel: Power control, reinstall your VPS, upload your own ISO, traffic stats, disk stats, etc.
-IPMI interface to manage dedicated servers.
-BGP session possibility for dedicated servers.
-Windows Included in VPS3-6.
-Recurring Referral Program.
-24/7 Livechat & Tickets Support.
